**Code for visualizing VAI**

# Intro

#### Libs

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
```

#### Data

```{r}
data<- read.csv(here("data", "raw_data", "qpcr", "vai", "rd_vai_daily.csv"))
```

# Cleaning

#### Select and Filter

```{r}
data<-
  data %>%
  filter(!Well %in% "I07") %>%
    select(Cq, Sample)
```

#### Make Day Column and Date Column

```{r}
data<-
  data %>%
  mutate(day = substr(data$Sample, 3,4),
         date = case_when(day == "7"~"2022-07-07",
                         day ==  "8"~"2022-07-08",
                         day ==  "9"~"2022-07-09",
                         day ==  "11"~"2022-07-11",
                         day == "12"~"2022-07-12",
                         day ==  "13"~"2022-07-13",
                         day ==  "14"~"2022-07-14",
                         day ==  "15"~"2022-07-15",
                         day ==  "16"~"2022-07-16",
                         day == "17"~"2022-07-17",
                         day ==  "18"~"2022-07-18",
                         day == "19"~"2022-07-19",
                         Sample == "e3" ~ "Pos_e3",
                         Sample == "e4" ~ "Pos_e4",
                         Sample == "NTC" ~ "Neg"))
```

# Plot

```{r}
data %>%
  ggplot() + geom_boxplot(
  aes(x = date,
      y = Cq)) +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1)) +
  labs(title = "Gulf Site VAI")
```

**Negatives amplified, and 18th may be inhibited?? Positive control was EKL-50 (Vc)**
